name: R4B-Endpoint-R5-Endpoint
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B Endpoint into FHIR R5

element.display: The technical details of an endpoint that can be used for electronic services

target.display: The technical details of an endpoint that can be used for electronic services
target.comment: R4B `Endpoint` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Endpoint`

element.display: The technical base address for connecting to this endpoint

target.display: The technical base address for connecting to this endpoint
target.comment: R4B `Endpoint.address` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Endpoint.address`

element.display: Protocol/Profile/Standard to be used with this endpoint connection

target.display: Protocol/Profile/Standard to be used with this endpoint connection
target.comment: R4B `Endpoint.connectionType` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Endpoint.connectionType` - connectionType changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *); connectionType changed the binding strength from Extensible to Example; connectionType has change due to type change: R4B connectionType Coding has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 connectionType

element.display: Contact details for source (e.g. troubleshooting)

target.comment: R4B `Endpoint.contact` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Endpoint.contact`

element.display: Contained, inline Resources

target.comment: R4B `Endpoint.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Endpoint.contained`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.comment: R4B `Endpoint.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Endpoint.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: Usage depends on the channel type

target.display: Usage depends on the channel type
target.comment: R4B `Endpoint.header` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Endpoint.header`

element.display: Logical id of this artifact

target.comment: R4B `Endpoint.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Endpoint.id`

element.display: Identifies this endpoint across multiple systems

target.display: Identifies this endpoint across multiple systems
target.comment: R4B `Endpoint.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Endpoint.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `Endpoint.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Endpoint.implicitRules`

element.display: Language of the resource content

target.comment: R4B `Endpoint.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Endpoint.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0

element.display: Organization that manages this endpoint (might not be the organization that exposes the endpoint)

target.display: Organization that manages this endpoint (might not be the organization that exposes the endpoint)
target.comment: R4B `Endpoint.managingOrganization` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Endpoint.managingOrganization`

element.display: Metadata about the resource

target.comment: R4B `Endpoint.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Endpoint.meta`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored

target.comment: R4B `Endpoint.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Endpoint.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: A name that this endpoint can be identified by

target.display: A name that this endpoint can be identified by
target.comment: R4B `Endpoint.name` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Endpoint.name`

element.display: Mimetype to send. If not specified, the content could be anything (including no payload, if the connectionType defined this)
The type of content that may be used at this endpoint (e.g. XDS Discharge summaries)
Interval the endpoint is expected to be operational

target.display: Interval the endpoint is expected to be operational
target.comment: R4B `Endpoint.period` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Endpoint.period`

element.display: active | suspended | error | off | entered-in-error | test

target.display: active | suspended | error | off | entered-in-error | test
target.comment: R4B `Endpoint.status` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Endpoint.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/endpoint-status|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/endpoint-status|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `Endpoint.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Endpoint.text`
